TRACK-TO-TRACK ASSOCIATION WITH AUGMENTED STATE 13 Richard W. Osborne, III obtained his B.S. and M.S. degrees in electrical engineer- ing from the University of Connecticut in 2004 and 2007, respectively. He is a graduate student currently working on his Ph.D. in electrical engineering at the University of Connecticut, Storrs, CT. His academic interests include target tracking, data fusion, and other areas of estimation.
